snippet: The documentary “The Act of Killing,” which has Werner Herzog and Errol Morris as executive producers, features an Indonesian death squad leader re-enacting his crimes, often with glee.
abstract: Joshua Oppenheimer's documentary film The Act of Killing, which has Werner Herzog and Errol Morris as executive producers, features an Indonesian death squad leader re-enacting his crimes, often with glee.
lead_paragraph: The documentary “The Act of Killing,” which has Werner Herzog and Errol Morris as executive producers, features an Indonesian death squad leader re-enacting his crimes, often with glee.

headline.seo: ‘The Act of Killing’ and Indonesian Death Squads
headline.main: A Movie’s Killers Are All Too Real
headline.print_headline: A Movie’s Killers Are All Too Real
